Floral basket to Kim Jong Il from Yasser Arafat 
    Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- A floral basket was sent to Kim Jong Il by Palestinian President Yasser Arafat on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of his election as General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 57th birthday of the WPK.
 It was handed to Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the WPK Central Committee, today by Shaher Mohammed Abdlah, Palestinian Ambassador to the DPRK.

Floral basket to Kim Jong Il 
    Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from Colonel Moammer El Gaddafi, leader of the  Great September First Revolution of Libya, on the occasion of the fifth anniversary of his election as General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 57th anniversary of the WPK.
 The floral basket was handed to Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the WPK Central Committee, by Ahmed Amer al Muakkaf, secretary of the people's bureau of Libya to the DPRK, today.
